title: Practice Tool
body: It has just been released on current patch but only on new client. Will it be available on old one?

replies.body:
WHAT HAPPENS IF U LEAVE IN PRACTICE TOOL?
WILL U GET LEVER BUSTER

New features, such as the *Practice Tool* are only available on the Beta Client. Going forward, the *Legacy Client* will eventually be phased out and the New Client will be the standard client for everyone, once it's ready.

If you have any questions, let me know.
i am from the euw so its now live but i cant seem to find it. i didnt download the beta yet... when can we have it...? i cant help it coz i dont like the beta i like the old one so...

I'm not sure I understand your question. You can upgrade to the Beta Client from the Legacy Patcher, as shown in the screenshot below:

https://imgur.com/a/GbgFI

You'll have access to new features as they roll out in the Beta Client. If you have any other questions, let me know.
Can you leave the Practice Tool mid practice without risks of for example LPQ?
Yes, since the Practice Tool currently only supports you playing alone, you can leave without penalty.
